On May 18th, the Forward Focus Journal Club hosted CSDisseminate collaborators [Dr. Danika Pfeiffer](https://www.csdisseminate.com/Team/Danika-Pfeiffer/) and [Dr. Austin Thompson](https://www.csdisseminate.com/Team/Austin-Thompson/) for a discussion of the recent paper, *“1-800-Help-Me-With-Open-Science-Stuff”: A Qualitative Examination of Open Science Practices in Communication Sciences and Disorders.* This study explored assistant professors’ perceptions of and experiences with open science practices. During the session, Drs. Pfeiffer and Thompson provided an overview of open science and shared practical tips for getting started.
